tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an authorization bypass. The `Request` class improperly handles certain `PATH_INFO` values, allowing URLs to be represented without a leading `/`. This behavior can bypass access control mechanisms that rely on the assumption that all paths begin with a `/`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `symfony/http-foundation` library to a patch version.
